how do i reset my password.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll receive an email with reset instructions within 5 minutes.

x.answer: Make sure you're using the email address you used to register. Contact support if you've changed your email.

i cant access my 2fa codes.answer: If you're having trouble with 2FA, you can use your backup codes or contact support for verification.

solutions.forgot_password: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll receive an email with reset instructions within 5 minutes.
solutions.email_not_recognized: Make sure you're using the email address you used to register. Contact support if you've changed your email.
solutions.two_factor: If you're having trouble with 2FA, you can use your backup codes or contact support for verification.

how do i update my profile.answer: Go to Settings > Profile to update your information. Changes may take up to 1 hour to reflect across the platform.

what information can i change in my prof.answer: You can update your Name, Contact information, Program details, Availability, and Pricing through the Profile settings.

profile_updates.instructions: Go to Settings > Profile to update your information. Changes may take up to 1 hour to reflect across the platform.

when do i get charged.answer: Monthly billing occurs on the 1st of each month

what payment methods do you accept.answer: We accept Credit/Debit Cards, ACH Transfers, and PayPal for payments.

my payment failed what should i do.answer: Update your payment method in Settings > Billing. Past due amounts will be automatically retried.

billing.billing_cycle: Monthly billing occurs on the 1st of each month

common_issues.failed_payment: Update your payment method in Settings > Billing. Past due amounts will be automatically retried.
common_issues.refund_policy: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days and are subject to our terms of service.

how does enrollment work.answer: Online enrollment allows parents to submit applications, upload documents, and pay deposits. Required documents include child's information, emergency contacts, immunization records, and signed agreements.

how do i manage my availability.answer: Use the scheduling system to set available hours, define age groups, manage waitlists, and handle part-time/full-time slots. Best practice is to update your availability at least monthly.

enrollment.process: Online enrollment allows parents to submit applications, upload documents, and pay deposits.

scheduling.best_practices: Update your availability at least monthly to maintain accurate scheduling.

communication_tools.messaging: Built-in messaging system for parent communications
communication_tools.notifications: Email and SMS alerts for important updates
communication_tools.announcements: Broadcast messages to all enrolled families

what are your full-time rates.answer: Full-time rates typically range from $800-$2000/month depending on location and age group.

do you offer sibling discounts.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for the second child.

what additional fees should i expect.answer: Additional fees include a $50-$100 annual registration fee, $25-$50 monthly materials fee, and optional meal plans at $5-$8 per day.

base_rates.full_time: Typically ranges from $800-$2000/month depending on location and age group
base_rates.drop_in: Available at premium rates where space permits

mobile_app: Photo upload delays on slow connections
Notification delays on some Android devices
web_platform: Report generation timeout for large datasets

when do i need to renew my license.answer: Annual license renewal is required 30 days before expiration. You'll need to maintain your state childcare license, business registration, and insurance documentation.

how often are background checks required.answer: Background checks are required every 2 years for providers, staff members, and regular volunteers.

licensing.renewal: Annual license renewal required 30 days before expiration

documentation.update_frequency: Review and update all forms annually
